<!-- Lightbox Modal -->
<div id="lightbox" class="lightbox">
  <span class="close" onclick="closeLightbox()">&times;</span>
  <img class="lightbox-content" id="expandedImg">
</div>

<script>
let isZoomed = false;

function openLightbox(imgElement) {
    var lightbox = document.getElementById("lightbox");
    var expandedImg = document.getElementById("expandedImg");

    expandedImg.src = imgElement.src;
    expandedImg.style.transform = "scale(1)"; // Reset zoom on open
    lightbox.style.display = "flex";
    isZoomed = false;
}

function toggleZoom() {
    var expandedImg = document.getElementById("expandedImg");
    if (isZoomed) {
        expandedImg.style.transform = "scale(1)"; // Reset size
    } else {
        expandedImg.style.transform = "scale(1.8)"; // Slight zoom
    }
    isZoomed = !isZoomed;
}

/* Close Lightbox */
function closeLightbox() {
    document.getElementById("lightbox").style.display = "none";
}

/* Attach Click Event for Zoom */
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
    document.getElementById("expandedImg").addEventListener("click", toggleZoom);
});
</script>
